projects.name: 3 Pillars Backend
projects.description:
https://3pillars.pythonanywhere.com/

A robust backend system for managing authentication, content, products, and e-commerce flows. Built with Django and integrated with Firebase for real-time notifications and user management.

projects.name: 3 Pillars Management Dashboard
projects.description:
https://3pillars-frontend.vercel.app/

A comprehensive frontend portal for business owners to manage their presence, view statistics, and configure advanced settings like API keys for Yoco or shipping providers.

projects.name: Java Mellow E-commerce
projects.description:
https://java-mellow-project.vercel.app/

A fully integrated e-commerce demonstration site featuring user registration, product CRUD operations, and a functional shopping cart with Yoco payment integration.

projects.name: Kastelo Mobile App Testing
projects.description:
https://www.kastelo.co.za/

End-to-end quality assurance for the Kastelo mobile ecosystem. Focused on validating the Django backend and the mobile application frontend on staging environments.

https://apps.apple.com/za/app/kastelo/id6447241940

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=za.co.kastelo
